sect1.title: Official Sites
sect1.para: www.mamboserver.com - The Official web site for Mambo
Bug Reporting - Use the bug tracker on mamboforge to lodge bugs that you find
forum.mamboserver.com - The Official technical support forum
Downloads and Patches - Get the Mambo source here as well as any updates

sect1.title: Addons for Mambo
sect1.para: mamboforge.net - The object of MamboForge.net is to provide a free project management and download environment for Mambo related projects. It is one of largest central repositories on the web for everything that is to do with Mambo.
